description: The children's mother managed to get out of the car and call for help after it plunged into Lough Foyle.
title: Donegal: Father and two children die as car enters Lough Foyle
title_page: Donegal: Father and two children die as car enters Lough Foyle - BBC News
maintext: "At the end, before she was moved to hospital, she was going round thanking everybody for what they had done, which was an amazing thing in itself that she was thinking of other people."
